Title: Relates to the declaration of a sign as a public nuisance and its removal
Summary: Relates to the declaration of a sign as a public nuisance and its removal by order of the commissioner.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the declaration of a sign as a public nuisance
